title: Udyr Bug

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
So i was playing this game and my friend had primal udyr on, but the udyr began to bug out at random times.
During mid game, he had his textures stretching to an allied champion and the shadow stretching to the enemy.

Sorry i dont have a screenshot of it but i think its because of the new patch 5.2 im not sure though :/

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

While we work on a fix, we've disabled SGU and Primal Udyr.
it's a bug with the latest patch, after your bud uses it the skin will be disabled for him. same goes for SGU
